subSubSection.paragraph: New York south to Georgia west to Manitoba, Iowa, and Arkansas.

The Arkansas specimens were identified morphologically as Orussus minutus Middlekauff, 1983 (Figs 1, 2). The 16S rRNA sequence (GenBank #KM379143) was a 99.5% match with an existing O. minutus sequence (EF032174), differing by two base pairs.
